System.Title: User growth system
System.Content: The first of its kind in Taiwan, it integrates the user growth system commonly used in the gaming industry into the exchange, and you can enjoy good benefits through active interaction.

Security.Title: Safety first
Security.Content: Adopt world-class DDoS defense mechanism and AI application firewall to maximize the protection of user assets

Legitimacy.Title: Legal compliance
Legitimacy.Content: Develop products and operating processes according to the highest standards of financial institutions, and adhere to KYC and AML regulations

Customize.Title: Tailor-made digital products
Customize.Content: Configure risk level framework and customized investment portfolio, provide tailor-made financial products and purchase/withdrawal limits

Disclaimer.Title: Disclaimer
Disclaimer.Content:
This disclaimer can only briefly describe some of the risk matters that may be involved. It cannot exhaustively list all the risks and various related aspects involved in the purchase, holding, buying and selling or trading process. It is recommended that you must consider various related aspects before purchasing.

Purchasers of NFTs issued by this project should understand that the market prices of blockchain commodities and cryptocurrency commodities are extremely volatile and uncertain, and not all people are suitable for purchasing, holding, and trading related behaviors.

Purchasing this product does not mean that you have exclusive or exclusive property rights to the works linked to this product, nor does it mean that you have been authorized by any intellectual property rights of the product. The purchaser agrees not to use the product for commercial purposes.

All information services provided by the company and this website may be invaded or accessed without authorization due to malicious hackers, viruses or other means. This website will try its best to control the risk, but there is no guarantee that the risk can be completely reduced.

The Company and its suppliers will not be liable for compensation or other liability for any damage suffered by you due to your use of this service, including but not limited to user errors (such as forgotten passwords, transaction errors or wrong addresses), server failure or data loss.

The Company is not responsible for continued malfunctions caused by vulnerabilities or any type of malfunction, abnormal behavior of software (such as wallets, smart contracts), blockchain or any other function of digital assets.

Buyers of this product should pay attention to the laws and public order and good customs of the country or region where they are located. Buyers should pay attention to and understand whether this product or the works linked to this product violate the laws or public order and good customs of the country or region where they are located.

The company reserves the right to make changes to all services, purchase rules, information content, and statements provided, and the changes will take effect immediately upon release.

Api.AccountNotFound: The corresponding account cannot be found.
Api.AgentNotFound: The corresponding agent cannot be found.
Api.AgentInactive: The agent corresponding to the application link is invalid.
Api.TakenIdNumber: The ID number has been used.
Api.TakenEmail: The email address is already in use.
Api.TakenLineId: LINE ID is already in use.
Api.TakenUsername: Account ID is already in use.
